name: nosedive
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a fast and sudden fall to the ground with the front pointing down: The plane roared overhead and went into a nosedive.
a sudden fast fall in prices, value, etc.: There was alarm in the markets when the dollar took a nosedive.
